name: Neon Trigger
description:
Neon Trigger is a top-down shooter, themed around Sci-fi with a low poly art style.  Players control a robot that shoots two different colour bullets. If the bullets hit the opposite colour, extra damage is given out.

  • W - Move forward
  • A - Move left
  • S - Move back
  • D - Move right
  • Q - Switch bullet
  • L Shift - Dash
  • Mouse - Look around
  • L Mouse Button - Shoot
